title: [BUG] hive_delimited_text_test fails in CDH
body:
We see differences between the CPU and GPU in CDH CICD for `hive_delimited_text_test` for decimal, timestamp, and dates. Here are some examples:

```
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.150Z] FAILED ../../src/main/python/hive_delimited_text_test.py::test_basic_hive_text_read[hive-delim-text/simple-int-values-StructType(List(StructField(number,DecimalType(10,2),true)))-{}][APPROXIMATE_FLOAT]
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.150Z] FAILED ../../src/main/python/hive_delimited_text_test.py::test_basic_hive_text_read[hive-delim-text/simple-int-values-StructType(List(StructField(number,DecimalType(10,3),true)))-{}][APPROXIMATE_FLOAT]
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.150Z] FAILED ../../src/main/python/hive_delimited_text_test.py::test_basic_hive_text_read[hive-delim-text/simple-float-values-StructType(List(StructField(number,DecimalType(10,3),true)))-{}][APPROXIMATE_FLOAT]
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.150Z] FAILED ../../src/main/python/hive_delimited_text_test.py::test_basic_hive_text_read[hive-delim-text/simple-float-values-StructType(List(StructField(number,DecimalType(38,10),true)))-{}][APPROXIMATE_FLOAT]
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.150Z] FAILED ../../src/main/python/hive_delimited_text_test.py::test_basic_hive_text_read[hive-delim-text/timestamp-StructType(List(StructField(ts,TimestampType,true)))-{}][APPROXIMATE_FLOAT]
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.150Z] FAILED ../../src/main/python/hive_delimited_text_test.py::test_basic_hive_text_read[hive-delim-text/date-StructType(List(StructField(date,DateType,true)))-{}][APPROXIMATE_FLOAT]
```

For decimal(10,2):

```
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.147Z] ### COLLECT: GPU TOOK 0.19381952285766602 CPU TOOK 0.22690200805664062 ###
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.147Z] CPU OUTPUT: [Row(number=None), Row(number=Decimal('-1.00')), Row(number=Decimal('0.00')), Row(number=Decimal('1.00')), Row(number=Decimal('127.00')), Row(number=Decimal('128.00')), Row(number=Decimal('-128.00')), Row(number=Decimal('-129.00')), Row(number=Decimal('32767.00')), Row(number=Decimal('-32768.00')), Row(number=Decimal('32768.00')), Row(number=Decimal('-32769.00')), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=Decimal('50.00')), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=Decimal('100.00')), Row(number=Decimal('100.00')), Row(number=None)]
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.147Z] GPU OUTPUT: [Row(number=None), Row(number=Decimal('-1.00')), Row(number=Decimal('0.00')), Row(number=Decimal('1.00')), Row(number=Decimal('127.00')), Row(number=Decimal('128.00')), Row(number=Decimal('-128.00')), Row(number=Decimal('-129.00')), Row(number=Decimal('32767.00')), Row(number=Decimal('-32768.00')), Row(number=Decimal('32768.00')), Row(number=Decimal('-32769.00')), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=Decimal('50.00')), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=None), Row(number=Decimal('100.00')), Row(number=None)]
```

For Date:
```
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.150Z] CPU OUTPUT: [Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 0, 0)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 0, 0)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 100000)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 120000)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 123000)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 123400)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 123450)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 123456)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 123456)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 0, 0)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1)), Row(ts=None), Row(ts=None)]
[2022-12-25T15:30:21.150Z] GPU OUTPUT: [Row(ts=None), Row(ts=None), Row(ts=None), Row(ts=None), Row(ts=None), Row(ts=None), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 100000)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 120000)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 123000)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 123400)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 123450)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 123456)), Row(ts=datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 16, 22, 32, 1, 123456)), Row(ts=None), Row(ts=None), Row(ts=None), Row(ts=None)]
```
